T02TD3650E:262a-1: sim ha n'a da s'a dha nam /
T02TD3650E:262a-4: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3650E:262a-5: gang zhig sngags shes pa'i sngags pa des /
T02TD3650E:262a-6: brdzun rnam pa thams cad du spang bar bya'o ;
T02TD3650E:262a-7: / dang por dus bzhi kha dag par bkrus te /
T02TD3650E:262a-8: shin tu gnas dben par bris sku la sogs pa'i thad du dkyil 'khor byas te /
T02TD3650E:262a-9: mchod pa mang po phul la stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02TD3650E:262a-10: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom mo //
T02TD3650E:262a-11: de nas bdag gi snying gar tsam las zla bar gyur pa'i hr'i:dkar po bsams pa'i 'od kyis nam mkhar bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gsal bar snang bar byas la /
T02TD3650E:262a-12: yang de'i 'od 'phros pa las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod la phyag byas te /
T02TD3650E:262a-13: sdig pa bshags shing rjes su yi rang nas /
T02TD3650E:262a-14: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol te /
T02TD3650E:262a-15: rgyal ba'i lam la gnas pas byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02TD3650E:262a-16: 'od slar 'dus pas thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms te /
T02TD3650E:262a-17: aom sva bh'a wa shuddh'a:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02TD3650E:262a-18: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'an badzrasva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD3650E:262a-20: de nas myur du pam las padma dmar por aa las gyur pa'i seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du tsam las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du hr'i:las seng ge'i sgra zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar po dbu skra'i cod pan can dang /
T02TD3650E:262a-21: snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can /
T02TD3650E:262a-23: phyed skyil du rgyal po chen po'i bzhugs thabs su bzhugs pa /
T02TD3650E:262b-0: phyag g-yon gyi phyag mthil sa la sbyar @262b ba'i mtheb mdzub kyis ral gris mtshan pa'i padma bzang po'i yu ba 'dzin pa /
T02TD3650E:262b-1: de'i ngos su gzhan yang bhandha dkar po dri zhim pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i padma'i yu ba can yod pa dang /
T02TD3650E:262b-2: phyag g-yas pa pus mo la brten te brkyang pa la brten par tri sh'u la sbrul dkar pos dkris pa yod cing /
T02TD3650E:262b-3: bsam gtan mdzad pa'i tshul can dbu'i thad ka nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'phro ba bsgoms la /
T02TD3650E:262b-4: snying ga'i zla bar hr'i:bsams pa dza:h'um gis ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste /
T02TD3650E:262b-5: bam gyis dbang du byas nas ho:sa dgyes pa bskyed par bsam mo //
T02TD3650E:262b-6: de nas 'dzab ni aom a'a:hr'i:sim ha n'a da h'um phat /
T02TD3650E:262b-7: seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
